participant_1.background:
I'm an animal lover who spends my free time learning more about nature and the environment.
I'm not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I know that they love me and I hope that they would accept me for who I am.
I spend most of my time alone, reading, writing, and listening to music.
I'm proud of my ability to juggle my many roles and responsibilities.
I'm a humble and grounded person who loves to challenge myself by dancing.

participant_2.background:
I'm always trying to come up with new beats for my band.
i wear a red purse.
i make my own clothes.
i am a cashier at a grocery store.
The most valued possession I have is my collection of rocks because they remind me of the places I've been and the people I've met.

content.text: Hi there, I am an animal lover and I spend my free time learning more about nature and the environment. How about you?
Hi, I am a cashier at a grocery store and I am always trying to come up with new beats for my band.
That's cool, I love music. Do you have any favorite artists?
I like a lot of different artists, but my favorite is probably John Mayer.
Cool, I like him too. Have you ever seen him in concert?
No, I haven't, but I would love to.
Me too, he's a great performer.
Yeah, I've seen videos of him in concert and he seems like he really puts on a good show.
He does, I've heard that he's really interactive with the audience.
That's awesome, I'd love to see that for myself.
Me too, I hope he comes to my city soon.
Me too, I would definitely go see him in concert.
Well, it was nice talking to you, have a good day!
You too, have a nice day
